title: Kabob's Acquisition, Inc. Recalls Meat and Poultry Products Due to Possible Listeria Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, May 10, 2017 Kabobs Acquisition, Inc., a Lake City, Ga. establishment, is recalling approximately 5,946 pounds of turkey and ham sandwich products which included a non-meat ingredient that was recalled due to Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...

establishment.name: Kabobs Aquisition , Inc.
establishment.address:
5423 North Lake Drive 
  Lake City, GA 30260

impacted_products: 13.125-lb. bulk cases containing 200 “Kabobs MONTE CRISTO TURKEY BREAST, HAM AND CHEESE SANDWICH” in shrink wrapped plastic trays and bearing case codes: PM14E27, PM14H14, PM14J10, PM14E01, PM14E12, PM14E13, PM15C26, PM15E06, PM15G23, PM14L18, PM15A08, PM
